commits.message:
merge duplicate rules - 8 (#147837)

* ##div[align="center"] > a[rel="nofollow"] > img

* #$?#body { padding-top: 0 !important; }

* ##a[href*="ad.adriver.ru/cgi-bin/click.cgi?"]

* ###bottom_blockBanner

* ##.ins_art_native

* Update specific.txt

---------

Co-authored-by: Sergey <s.lyapin@adguard.com>
